website_summaries.verdict: Homebrew kit that includes all the tools you will need to make your own wine.
pros: A complete kit for getting started in home wine making
Includes a hydrometer and test jar
cons: You will have all the tools, but need to find your own recipe

customer_reviews.title: Likely better off buying individual pieces
customer_reviews.text: Have had to replace several pieces of this kit. Likely better off buying individual pieces.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit & outstanding follow up to help you
customer_reviews.text: A really outstanding starter kit. Everything you need to "get started" making wine. The best thing is the DVD instructions & the follow up online chats. They have all the answers to your questions with no hassell to buy something. Great people. The one problem with the the kit is the cheap plastic corker, very hard to use. Would be better to not include it & charge less and give you the option to buy one with handles (about $35.00). Thanks for the great support. Tim does really good on the DVD except for the "corker"!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Their customer service is like no other in this day and age!!
customer_reviews.text: About 2 days after I ordered my Master Vintner Wine Making Equipment starter, I received an email from Northern Brewers telling me if I had any questions at all, they are available 24/7 to help. Wow! Nobody does customer service like that anymore!! The kit came even earlier than it was scheduled. Everything was as it was supposed to be. I watched the DVD and started my first batch of wine EVER! If it doesn't work it, it would be to no fault of Northern Brewers. The DVD was very helpful since I didn't know anything about wine except what I like to drink! Thank you Northern Brewers!! I'm looking forward to my first batch in 28 days!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: First time
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great and packaged nicely. All items were as expected. Big problem is glass carboy cracked along bottom. Noticed break, once it was empty, after bottling wine. Neither one of us recall anything that would have caused it to happen so not sure when crack happened. Good side. Was able to bottle the wine and ut didn't leak out!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need to make wine making easy. It is a starter kit so some of the tools are a little basic and may need upgrading after a few batches if you want. During the first batch the big mouth bubbler lid came off and needed some extra weight added to hold it in place but overall I am very satisfied with the products
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Excited
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything needed. Video is excellent. My first batch of wine is fermenting as we speak. I did upgrade the corker. Thank goodness. I have no idea what that thing is, that came in the box. Thankfully the previous reviews prepared me. Thanks for a complete system!
customer_reviews.author: dreamweaver

customer_reviews.title: and a great DVD showing you exactly how to make wine
customer_reviews.text: This kit has ALL the equipment you'll need to make wine: primary and secondary fermentation vessels, bungs and air locks, hydrometer and test jar, thermometers, wine thief, siphon rod and hose, cleaning and sanitizing chemicals, a bottle filler, a corker, corks, and a great DVD showing you exactly how to make wine. All you need is a wine starter kit and bottles.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Finished my first batch of wine. Everything worked excellent and as advertised. The only thing that I didn’t use was the corker because I bought a floor corker instead. I am very impressed with this kit. Would definitely buy again to have two batches at the same time!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of equipment but most items are cheap
customer_reviews.text: This has a lot of equipment with it, however the items are cheaply made. I also did not receive any instructions, so it was very confusing and time consuming to have to google every single item
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: wine making
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We have just enough grapes to make 6 gallons of wine, so it worked out great that we could buy a kit without grape juice included.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Made GOOD wine first time!
customer_reviews.text: This set worked great, only thing I did not like an replaced with a different type was the bottle corker, that red plastic thing is hard to use!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Quick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality winemaking set
customer_reviews.text: The glass carboy is pretty, but its a little difficult to manage since its glass. Its also kind of heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son-in-law for Christmas. He has not used it yet, but is excited to get started making wine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Greiwe

customer_reviews.title: I love Northern Brewer and this wine making kit is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Northern Brewer and this wine making kit is the best one to get. It comes with everything you will need except the bottles you will need for storing your wine. Their customer service is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. I would get a new corker because that one is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Getting the feel if how to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I liked just about everything, the only thing I didn’t like is that it did not come with a recipe or wine bottles, but overall good deal.
customer_reviews.author: MBrown86

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the kit and have my wine fermenting. This kit has all that you need and a little bit more. I am also very happy with Northern Brewer's customer service. They ensure they take care of any questions you have about any of your kit.
customer_reviews.author: LDwyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This kit was easy to use and the dvd that came with it was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: hlw2010

customer_reviews.title: why can't i reach someone to talk about missing pieces?
customer_reviews.text: Instructional dvd was not in box. could not contact anyone. SOL
customer_reviews.author: Mark BradshawAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for starting out except for the corker you will want to upgrade it
customer_reviews.author: Taj Mehalek

customer_reviews.title: Happy Fermentor
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and products all in excellent condition. Cant wait to start Brewing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: should have been 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: It is as described. The kit came with everything needed. The only reason its not a 5 star is because it is a 6 gallon Glass carboy(not their fault) It's just I should have gotten the 5 gallon because most recipes use ingredients measured for 5 gallons. Read your recipe before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Complete. Awesome! Everything I expected. Only thing, definitely want an upgrade in corker.
customer_reviews.author: erik hoover

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the kit... just wish it had a larger primary fermenter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my wife for Christmas and we have our first batch of wine brewing right now. The kit seems to have everything I could need to get started... except the wine. The only concern I would have is that the Big Mouth Bubbler (the primary fermenter) is only 6.5 gallons. This doesn't leave a lot of room for the primary fermentation. I read some stories of messes happening when the air locks got clogged, so we opted to run a hose from the top of the air lock into a jar to avoid the possibility. This kit with a larger primary fermenter would be a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Winemaking
customer_reviews.text: Everything was in one piece and it has worked perfectly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Louer

customer_reviews.title: Watch out... Broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: Finished our first batch of wine this afternoon. Everything was going smoothly until the entire bottom busted out of the glass Carboy. I had 5+ gallons of wine all over my kitchen. I'm extremely dissatisfied. I have contacted the company and I'm just waiting for a reply.
customer_reviews.author: nikki biggs

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I received the package damaged as there were no glass protection on the gallon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the whole kit
customer_reviews.text: I like the whole kit. I was disappointed that the Corker was not the one in the picture. But my main concern is the Big mouth Bubbler Lid keeps working itself open. I put it all the way on securely and the following day it has worked itself halfway off. It was all the way open after the weekend and I am not sure if my Peach Must is still viable. It is bubbling out of the water valve so pressure should not be enough to make the lid open but somehow the lid still slowly works open. I would rather have the screw on lid that is in the how to video.
customer_reviews.author: Vivien Reis

customer_reviews.title: Very Complete
customer_reviews.text: Amazing the amount of quality all the products are from the carboy all the way to the corks that come with it, it is my first time trying to make wine and this comes with all you could possibly need and more to make the wine making process easy to make and understand, From the sanitization all the way to bottling. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Tellez

customer_reviews.title: Keep calm and make wine.
customer_reviews.text: We are very excited to start making wine at home. We have a family recipe that we plan to try and then we hope to try many different flavors. My husband has made wine before and he thinks this is a great set that has everything you need to get started included in it. I am hoping that we get this going soon. We can have it brewing and then share it with friends later. We bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Derry

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: This apparatus is giant! And the customer service from this company was awful. Zero stars
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Luis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Equipment is nice and easy to use and well built. Was sent wrong hose , but customer service took care of it. They respond in a very reasonable time.
customer_reviews.author: Lights

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his wine kit. Had everything he needed! His first batch of wine came out awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've started my first batch, it has pretty much everything you need, but no instructions. Alll of it came unbroken. Kit works good, and I'm excited to see what the wine turns out like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great kit
customer_reviews.text: Other than the corker included with this kit is mostly worthless, the rest of the kit is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stout

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: send this to my son and he is very happy he did the second kit already.
customer_reviews.author: Jose R Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: this is the best kit for even a newbie home wine maker
customer_reviews.text: this is the best kit for even a newbie home wine maker. The kit is complete with everything you need plus an instructional DVD!!!! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: C3

customer_reviews.title: Love my new home wine making set!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the real deal, Evander Holyfield!! I was overwhelmed with all the supplies that came with it at first, but after you take a step back, you'll realize that you really are equipped with everything you need to make your very own wine from scratch!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Samra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit complete with everything you will need except concentrate and a heating pad if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Wine hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: Let's make wine
customer_reviews.text: Learning how to make wine. The proper equipment makes a successful outcome possible most every batch. Kit contains quality materials that a beginner can start making kit wines. Actually amazing the process of turning juice and water into wine. The included DVD has
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Carmack

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product it came complete and nothing was ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product it came complete and nothing was missing . Im so ready to start using it !!
customer_reviews.author: Rengalmatt

customer_reviews.title: sweet berry wine
customer_reviews.text: Just getting started on my wine making journey, but this kit so far is very complete and giving me confidence. It not only includes all the tools you need (sans the actual grapes and other edible material) it has nice glossy guides and instructions and tips, as well as links to other resources. The process will take some time so I cannot yet report on my success, but I can say so far so good. Again, you still have to buy actual grapes, etc to go along with this kit, but this kit will point you in the right direction for this part as well
customer_reviews.author: Pa Holm

product_meta.title: Master Vintner Wine Making Equipment Starter Kit with Plastic Big Mouth Bubbler and Glass Carboy
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE WINE MAKING EQUIPMENT STARTER KIT. Compatible with any Wine Ingredient Recipe Kit (Not Included).
COMPLETE SET OF WINE MAKING TOOLS; START TO FINISH. The first starter kit that delivers finished wine faster
EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO MAKE WINE. Equipped with all the tools you need to make top-quality wine from a recipe kit or when you advance to using fresh juice.
WINE MAKING AUTHORITY AND THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE IN THE INDUSTRY. Unparalleled instruction from industry leader Tim Vandergrift
INNOVATIVE. Features our innovative Big Mouth Bubbler plastic wide mouth carboy fermentor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
